title: Gmail Loading & Attachment Fix
description: Fix Gmail slowness, 'Still working...' messages, and attachment download failures.

steps.title: Load Basic HTML Version
steps.instruction: If Gmail is stuck, click 'Load basic HTML' at the bottom right during the loading screen. This helps on very slow networks.

steps.title: Disable Gmail Labs/Add-ons
steps.instruction: Open Gmail with 'https://mail.google.com/mail/?labs=0' to see if a third-party add-on is crashing the interface.

steps.title: Check Attachment Type
steps.instruction: Gmail blocks certain executable files (.exe, .zip with scripts). Ensure the file isn't on the 'blocked types' list or use Google Drive to share it.

steps.title: Clear Browser Data
steps.instruction: Settings → Privacy and Security → Clear browsing data → select 'Cookies and other site data' specifically for google.com.

steps.title: Incognito Test
steps.instruction: Open Gmail in an Incognito window (Ctrl+Shift+N). If it works there, one of your browser extensions is interfering.
